title: Google Pixel Xl Grey 32Gb Too many warm and heating issue
content:
Dear Google
 A Big problem in my Google device ( Google Pixel Xl Grey 32Gb) and problem related by heating issue . 
In this case first my mobile charge by original charger than my mobile too many heat and creat a short circuit ( Current in body ) and after this case my device unsupport my original accessories like charger.
After this case my device totally go in dead condition.
Kindly solve this issue immediately.
Thank you !
